name: PYPOWER-dynamics
body:
### PYPOWER-Dynamics

A Python-based time-domain simulation (transient stability) program and an extension module for [PYPOWER](https://github.com/rwl/PYPOWER).

![screenshot of sample output](https://github.com/susantoj/PYPOWER-Dynamics/blob/master/screenshots/open_loop.png?raw=true)

### Documentation

Documentation is located at the [PYPOWER-Dynamics Wiki](https://github.com/susantoj/PYPOWER-Dynamics/wiki).

### Dependencies

PYPOWER-Dynamics requires:

* [Python](http://www.python.org) 3 or later.
* [PYPOWER](https://github.com/rwl/PYPOWER)
* [SciPy Stack](http://www.scipy.org) 0.9 or later.
